alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg; Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 11:45AM EDT until June 29 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Muhlenberg County in south central Kentucky... Northern Todd County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1045 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Weir to 8 miles northeast of Dunmor, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weir, Dunmor, Greenville, Drakesboro, Allegre, Everett and Clifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
